name: part_002
file: tmp_【重大発表あり!!!】宝鐘マリン生誕祭 3D LIVE！豪華ゲスト＆新曲お披露目！【ホロライブ⧸宝鐘マリン】 [NxtHvRVLzXM]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_002.mov

scenes.description: Continuation of the performance of the song 'Ai-pai' with choreography involving the three performers and bear-shaped mascots.
Performance of the song 'Megumi no Hito' on a ship-themed stage with vibrant lights.
